tasks.task: Discussing methods of weed control in agriculture
subtasks: Explain prevention as the first principle of weed control
Describe the eradication principle to completely eliminate weed seed
Detail the control principle which partially removes weeds
Outline the management principle combining various control methods
Explain tillage as the oldest method, covering its mechanisms
Describe hoeing's effectiveness on perennial weeds and its use in row crops
Explain hand weeding using tools like khurpi or sickle
Detail digging for removing underground parts of perennial weeds
Describe sickling and moving to remove top growth and prevent seed production
Explain burning as a weed control method in sugar cane fields
Discuss flooding as a method for killing water-sensitive weeds
